![](c3-group.jpg)

The [C3-2023 Symposium](https://www.sydney.edu.au/science/our-research/research-centres/centre-for-complex-systems/c3-symposia.html) took place in Heron Island, QLD, Australia, in January 2023.
Complex Systems researchers from around the globe got together for an enriching week of presentations and conversations, snorkeling and relaxation.
